abstract: Government report says plant run by Jeni's Splendid Ice Creams in Columbus, OH, inadequately tested and cleaned facilities before listeria was discovered in some of its products.
lead_paragraph: No illnesses are connected to the recall, and Jeni’s says it is making ice cream again and reopening shops on Friday after intensive cleaning.

headline.main: Jeni’s Ice Cream Shops to Reopen After Recall
headline.print_headline: Jeni’s Ice Cream Shops to Reopen After Recall

snippet: No illnesses are connected to the recall, and Jeni’s says it is making ice cream again and reopening shops on Friday after intensive cleaning.
